name: Trouble in Paradise (itch)
description:
This is simply a very rough version of what this game might look like mechanically, and does not necissarily represent what a finished version might look like narritively or visualy.

All music used is from the YouTube Audio Library:

  •  First Dream - Brian Bolger
  • Vespers on the Shore - The Mini Vandals
  • Planetary Paths - Joel Cummins, Andy Farag
  • Nightmares Inn - RKVC
  • Der König - Jeremy Black
  • Love and Marriage - Jeremy Black
  • Nocturne - Asher Fulero
  • Please Don't Go - Jeremy Black
  • Everywhere You Know - Jeremy Black

Some sounds are from the YouTube Audio Library and Zapsplat.com

All other sounds were made using BFXR.

All art and sprites with the exception of the battle background are made by myself.
